In recent years there has been an increasing awareness in the social sciences that producing knowledge requires more rigour and humility in the research process [@nosekReplicabilityRobustnessReproducibility2021]. 
In the aftermath of the replication crisis, the adoption of open science practices has been enthusiastic in psychology research [@bauerPsychologicalScienceStepping2022]. 
The areas of research that psychology researchers perceived preregistration practices benefitted the most were in the planning and application of theory, hypotheses, analysis [@sarafoglouSurveyHowPreregistration2022].
